# Command Line

create new venv

```{bash}
python3 -m venv env
```


activate it

```{bash}
source env/bin/activate
```


installing packages

```{bash}
python3 -m pip install jupyter matplotlib pandas
```


deactivate

```{bash}
deactivate
```
